name: Prison Escape 3D: Jailbreak
description:
What can you do to get out of prison? Gather a team of ragdoll cellmates, solve tricky puzzles, and break out to freedom!

Employ stealth and cunning to sneak past all the guards! Don’t let them detect you and get your mates down. The more escapists get out of the prison, the more bonuses you get.

Why you’ll love the prison break game

- Lots of tricky puzzles to solve
- Exciting stickman gameplay
- Various weapons to use
- Amusing ragdoll physics
- Beautiful graphics
- Intuitive controls

Figure out a way to outsmart everyone! Test your logic skills in one of the best 3D jail games. Lots of cool action missions and puzzles await you! Download now!
